snippet.title: Spaceman Memories - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Tour the charming world of Spaceman Memories in this trailer for the upcoming retro JRPG that takes place in a distant future but draws inspiration from ancient Japanese folktales. A story full of wonder and nostalgia as you take on the role of Ichiro 94, an astronaut who wakes up from hypersleep to go on a journey to find the remnants of his past. Spaceman Memories will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
